name: Deacon Armstrong
role: Turn Meter Manipulation / Debuffer / Speed Lead

skills.name: Mace of Contempt
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a [Leech] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: 30% chance per hit to place Leech for 2 turns.

skills.notes: Leech is valuable for Clan Boss and sustain.

skills.name: Sweeping Retribution
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has an 80% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: 80% chance to place 60% Decrease DEF for 2 turns.

skills.notes: One of the best AoE Decrease DEF skills for all content.

skills.name: Time Compression
skills.description: Fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 15% and decreases the Turn Meters of all enemies by 15%. Grants an Extra Turn.

effects.notes: Fills all allies' Turn Meter by 15%.
Decreases all enemies' Turn Meter by 15%.

skills.notes: Enables speed tuning and TM manipulation for all content.

forms.aura: Increases Ally SPD in all Battles by 19%.
forms.comments: Deacon Armstrong is a top-tier epic for speed tuning, TM manipulation, and AoE Decrease DEF.
